name: OverSheeped
description:
Protect your sheep at all costs.

Click Sheep to Make them Turn Around. 
Purchase Fences and Other Items To Aid In Protecting Your Heard!
Watch out for the menacing dog that loves to scare your sheep!

HOW TO PLAY

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Use mouse to click sheep to make them turn around

Click build to purchase walls and other items to keep your sheep safe.

Purchase more sheep in order to make a greater income!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
